detection.description: A list containing the detection sets present in the document.

static_cuas_location.description: The 3D GPS location of the CUAS. Can be overriden per Record, but even if overriden this value must exist and be a valid position.

tracks.description: A list containing the tracks present in the document.

Arc.description: Describes a circular arc between two clockwise angles from true north.

from.description: Minimum compass angle from the CUAS System to the UAS in degrees.

to.description: Maximum compass angle from the CUAS System to the UAS in degrees.

name.description: Free-form text describing the detection set. Can be, for instance, the name present on the HMI.

records.description: A list of records associated with this detection.

uas_id.description:
An unique ID used to associate this detection with a specific UAS. The number itself is not relevant, it just needs to be unique per UAS.

If null, means the system was not able to identify the records present along with this object with any specific UAS.

Location.description: Location of an UAS, which may be relative to the CUAS.

oneOf.description: Circular arc relative to the CUAS within which the UAS resides.
Compass quadrant where the UAS has been observed.
Clockwise angle in degrees from true north where the UAS has been observed.
Flat 2D position given in latitude and longitude.
3D position given in latitude, longitude and height.
Ray where the UAS has been observed given in bearing and elevation.

bearing.description: Clockwise angle in degrees from true north where the UAS has been observed.

elevation.description: Elevation angle in degrees over the horizon where the UAS has been observed.

oneOf.description: 3D position of the UAS given in bearing, elevation angle and distance.

bearing.description: Clockwise angle in degrees from true north where the UAS has been observed.

distance.description: Distance from the UAS to the CUAS given in meters.

elevation.description: Elevation angle in degrees over the horizon where the UAS has been observed.

Position2d.description: 2D WGS84 position given in latitude and longitude.

lat.description: GPS WGS84 latitude measured in degrees.

lon.description: GPS WGS84 longitude measured in degrees.

Position3d.description: 3D WGS84 position given in latitude, longitude and height.

height.description: Height measured in meters from sea level.

lat.description: GPS WGS84 latitude measured in degrees.

lon.description: GPS WGS84 longitude measured in degrees.

alarm.description: Whether the alarm function of the CUAS system is active or not. An Alarm is defined as the function of a CUAS system alerting an Operator via the HMI and the generation of associated data in the UAS Activity Log, as a result of Declared UAS activity.

alarm_certainty.description: How certainly should the alarm be on, as a value from 0 (Least likely) to 1 (Most likely).

cuas_location.description: The 3D GPS location of the CUAS recorded on this instant. Overrides the document's static_cuas_location.

identification.description: Free form text, possibly describing the model or configuration of the UAS identified.

location.description: The UAS location, which may be given in one of several declaration types.

record_number.description: A unique number that identifies this record between all other ones present in the document.

time.description: UTC time in the RFC 3339 format for date and time (As described in https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc3339#section-5.6)

name.description: Free-form text describing the track. Can be, for instance, the name present on the HMI.

records.description: A list of records associated with this track.

uas_id.description:
An unique ID used to associate this track with a specific UAS. The number itself is not relevant, it just needs to be unique per UAS.

If null, means the system was not able to identify the records present along with this object with any specific UAS.
